title: I Can't Find A Man In Real Life Or Online
itunes:title: I Can't Find A Man In Real Life Or Online
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, this isn’t a typical letter about cheating. I am in my mid 30s and I’ve been single for too long. I’m a nurse and I meet a lot of great men at work, but I'm not having any luck in love. When I meet a guy, I’m optimistic and not expecting him to play games just to have sex with me. I’m the type to text right back, return calls and show up early for a date. My girlfriends say I catch feelings too quick and I’m a hopeless romantic...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, this isn’t a typical letter about cheating. I am in my mid 30s and I’ve been single for too long. I’m a nurse and I meet a lot of great men at work, but I'm not having any luck in love. When I meet a guy, I’m optimistic and not expecting him to play games just to have sex with me. I’m the type to text right back, return calls and show up early for a date. My girlfriends say I catch feelings too quick and I’m a hopeless romantic...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
